Class BatteryPub

  • Defined in File battery_pub.h

Inheritance Relationships

Base Type

Class Documentation

class BatteryPub : private Publisher

Publisher for battery sensor data.

Author

Nelson Durrant

Date

September 2024

Public Functions

virtual void setup(rcl_node_t node)

This function sets up the battery publisher.

Parameters

node – the micro-ROS node

void publish(float voltage, float current)

This function publishes the battery data to the micro-ROS agent.

Parameters

  • voltage – the battery voltage (V)

  • current – the battery current (A)

inline void destroy(rcl_node_t node)

This function destroys the publisher.

Parameters

node – the micro-ROS node
